archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Sales Contact
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Manage all sales contacts between potential or existing parties and the enterprise.

properties.value: Manage Sales Contact manages all contacts between potential or existing parties and the enterprise. It deals with the creation of a contact, its development and updates to it. This process interacts with Customer Interaction Management and Party Interaction Management to manage the contact once an Market/Sales related interaction is initiated by a party.
